abstract.original_text: Murine models of severe acute respiratory syndrome-associated coronavirus (SARS-CoV) will greatly advance research on this emerging virus. When BALB/c mice were simultaneously inoculated intranasally and orally, replication of SARS-CoV was found in both lung and intestinal tissue.

sentences.segment_text: Murine models of severe acute respiratory syndrome-associated coronavirus ( SARS-CoV ) will greatly advance research on this emerging virus .
When BALB/c mice were simultaneously inoculated intranasally and orally ,
replication of SARS-CoV was found in both lung and intestinal tissue .
